name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - Traitor Legions Pack
summary: The emperor's children Legion betrayed their figurative father -- the Emperor of Man -- some ten thousand years ago, during the Horus Heresy. The Legion fell to the perverse temptations of the Chaos God Slaanesh, becoming addicted to the sensations of battle and conquest. They have served the Prince of Excess ever since.
